name: crochet kitchen scrubby
notes:
this cotton scrubby is designed to have the same look and feel as your kitchen sponge, but is 100% cotton and reusable. these are super easy to make! the whole project can be completed in under an hour. and with all the colors of cotton and scrubby yarn out there, the color combination possibilities are endless! great for yourself, or as an easy gift!

finished measurements: 5.25” x 3.75”

materials:
us i/9 5.5 mm crochet hook
red heart scrubby yarn
100% cotton size 4 yarn
yarn needle for weaving in ends
scissors

stitches used:
(ch) chain
(sc) single crochet
(hdc) half double crochet
(sl st) slip stitch
